title: Mod Physics (Patched)
author: Rehan30g Team
description: Welcome to the patched version of Mod Physics designed for mobile users.
about: Hello! Welcome to the patched version of Mod Physics. This mod is designed for mobile users, including Pojavlauncher, HMCL, and others.
information: This Mod is compatible with fabric 1.20.1.
Does not support any shader if you are using Optifabric or Iris.
Both Pro and Free versions are included.
attention: This mod doesn't support Optifine Shaders, whether it's a pro or original version. Attempting to force it may result in crashes unless you use a zink renderer.

setup.note: Please note that this patch does not support the arm32 device!
